column3: 3 Add-1/4 cup mayonnaise to the bowl
2 Add-1 tsp Sriracha sauce to the bowl
6 Add-add chopped scallion to the bowl
7 Add-Add 1 can drained tuna to the bowl
9 Mix-Mix the contents of the bowl
10 Season-season 1/4 tsp pepper on the bowl
14 place-place avocado slices on each leaf
15 top-top lettuce leaves with the tuna mixture
17 secure-secure the wrap with a toothpick
